jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Provide operational support for external and internal software products to increase the products’ availability and reliability.
Configure and deploy new software and troubleshoot and resolve issues when things break.
Optimize and automate work and develop tools as needed to accomplish new tasks.
Handle a variety assignments and requests that come from various customers including OCC, Helpdesk, Software Support, development teams, and infrastructure teams.
Utilize application development experience and experience working with application servers such as WildFly and JBoss.
Use Source Code Management (GitHub, GitLab, and TFS) and continuous integration and continuous deployment tools such as Jenkins.
Use monitoring tools including Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus, or AWS CloudWatch.
Work with Linux OS to collaborate with teammates and product owners grooming backlogs of epics and stories for upcoming sprints.
Stay abreast of the latest technology trends through individual and team training opportunities.
Provide 7x24 operational support for multiple online products on a rotational basis within team.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field plus five (5) years of experience with application development.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and five (5) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or a related field plus two (2) years of experience with application development.
Other experience and skills must include:
Application servers and Web servers on Linux OS.
Source code management including GitHub, GitLab, TFS and continuous integration and continuous deployment (CICD) including Jenkins.
Monitoring tools including Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus, and AWS CloudWatch.
Perl, Shell, and Python scripting.
Orchestration including Docker Compose and Kubernetes.
AWS public cloud experience.
Configuration Management tools such as Ansible scripts and Puppet for Virtual Machine (VM) provisioning.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Develop, enhance, and maintain backend services and APIs to support web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with frontend developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
Ensure the performance, security, and scalability of server-side code.
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize existing systems to improve performance and resolve issues.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards.
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and share knowledge with the team.
Implement and manage continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the backend architecture remains modern and efficient.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in backend development.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and three (3) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field plus one (1) year of experience in backend development.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in server-side languages such as Python, Java, Node.js, or Ruby.
Experience with database management systems including SQL and NoSQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Redis.
Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementation.
Knowledge of microservices architecture and containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience with version control systems such as Git.
Understanding of security best practices in backend development.
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Experience with automated testing frameworks and tools.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as in a team.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Analyze and interpret complex data sets to provide actionable insights and recommendations.
Develop, implement, and maintain machine learning models and algorithms to solve business problems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data needs and deliver data-driven solutions.
Perform data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature engineering to prepare data for analysis and modeling.
Visualize data using tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or matplotlib to communicate findings to stakeholders.
Conduct statistical analysis and hypothesis testing to validate models and ensure their robustness.
Automate data workflows and processes to improve efficiency and reproducibility.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science and machine learning technologies and methodologies.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in data science or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and three (3) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field plus one (1) year of experience in data science or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, or XGBoost.
Knowledge of statistical methods and data analysis techniques.
Familiarity with big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka.
Experience with data visualization tools and libraries.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as in a team.
Excellent communication skills to present complex information clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Understanding of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud for data storage and processing.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide actionable recommendations.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports using data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Excel.
Perform data cleaning and preprocessing to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Generate ad-hoc reports to support decision-making processes.
Identify areas for process improvement and automation to enhance data analysis efficiency.
Work with data engineering teams to ensure data availability and quality.
Stay updated with industry best practices and emerging trends in data analysis and visualization.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Business, or a related field plus two (2) years of experience in data analysis or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and two (2) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Business, or a related field plus six (6) months of experience in data analysis or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in data analysis tools and programming languages such as SQL, Python, or R.
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Excel.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Knowledge of statistical analysis and data mining techniques.
Excellent communication skills to present data insights clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy and integrity.
Understanding of database management systems and data warehousing.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Define the product vision, strategy, and roadmap based on customer needs, market trends, and business objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, marketing, and sales to deliver high-quality products on time and within budget.
Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and inform product decisions.
Gather and prioritize product and customer requirements, translating them into detailed specifications and user stories.
Manage the product development lifecycle from concept to launch, ensuring alignment with business goals and user needs.
Monitor product performance and gather user feedback to drive continuous improvement and iteration.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, communicating product progress and updates regularly.
Lead product launch activities, including go-to-market planning, training, and marketing communications.
Stay updated with industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure the product remains competitive and innovative.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field plus five (5) years of experience in product management or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and five (5) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in product management or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Strong understanding of product development processes and methodologies, including Agile and Scrum.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Experience with product management tools such as JIRA, Trello, or Aha!.
Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to present complex information clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Ability to think strategically and execute methodically.
Experience in market research, user research, and data analysis.
Knowledge of UX/UI principles and best practices.
Understanding of software development and technology trends.

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to understand user needs and business goals.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for web and mobile applications.
Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on design solutions.
Develop and maintain design systems and guidelines to ensure a consistent user experience across all products.
Translate complex ideas into intuitive and accessible user interfaces.
Work closely with development teams to ensure design feasibility and fidelity during implementation.
Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve the design process.
Present design concepts and solutions to stakeholders, incorporating their feedback into final designs.
Contribute to a culture of innovation and creativity within the design team.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Fine Arts, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in product design or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and three (3) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Fine Arts, or a related field plus one (1) year of experience in product design or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or InVision.
Strong portfolio demonstrating experience with user-centered design and interaction design.
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Experience with user research methods and usability testing.
Excellent visual design skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Understanding of responsive design and accessibility principles.

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Conduct user research and gather insights to understand user needs, behaviors, and pain points.
Create user personas, journey maps, wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs to guide the user experience.
Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define and implement innovative solutions for product direction, visuals, and experience.
Conduct usability testing and gather feedback to iterate on design solutions and improve user satisfaction.
Develop and maintain UX design guidelines and standards to ensure consistency across all products.
Work closely with development teams to ensure the feasibility and fidelity of designs during implementation.
Stay updated with the latest UX design trends, tools, and best practices to continuously improve the design process.
Present design concepts and solutions to stakeholders and incorporate their feedback into final designs.
Advocate for the user and promote a user-centered design approach within the organization.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in UX design or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and three (3) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Psychology, or a related field plus one (1) year of experience in UX design or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in UX design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or InVision.
Strong portfolio demonstrating experience with user-centered design and interaction design.
Experience with user research methods and usability testing.
Excellent visual design skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Understanding of responsive design and accessibility principles.
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Create visually appealing graphics and layouts for various digital and print materials including websites, social media, advertisements, brochures, and presentations.
Collaborate with marketing, product, and development teams to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality design solutions.
Develop and maintain a consistent brand identity across all design projects.
Use design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) to create and refine graphics.
Present design concepts to stakeholders and incorporate feedback to finalize designs.
Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and best practices to ensure innovative and contemporary designs.
Prepare and optimize graphics for web and print, ensuring they meet technical requirements and quality standards.
Work with external vendors such as printers and agencies to produce final design materials.
Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and maintaining high standards of quality.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field plus two (2) years of experience in graphic design or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and two (2) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field plus six (6) months of experience in graphic design or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other design tools.
Strong portfolio demonstrating a range of design skills and creativity.
Excellent visual design skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Knowledge of print production processes and requirements.
Understanding of web design principles and best practices is a plus.
Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Design, implement, and manage CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient and reliable software delivery.
Collaborate with development, QA, and operations teams to automate and streamline build, test, and deployment processes.
Monitor system performance, identify issues, and implement solutions to maintain high availability and reliability of applications.
Manage infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation.
Ensure security best practices are followed in the DevOps processes and infrastructure.
Implement and manage containerization and orchestration solutions using Docker and Kubernetes.
Perform regular system maintenance and upgrades, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum efficiency.
Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for all implemented processes and infrastructure.
Stay updated with the latest DevOps tools, technologies, and best practices to continuously improve the DevOps processes.
Provide support and troubleshooting assistance to development and operations teams as needed.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in DevOps or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and three (3) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field plus one (1) year of experience in DevOps or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI.
Experience with containerization and orchestration tools such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation.
Strong scripting skills in languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell.
Understanding of version control systems such as Git.
Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Splunk.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Understanding of security best practices in a DevOps environment.

jobs.title: Cloud Architect
jobs.description:
Job Description:

Design and implement scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud architectures for various applications and services.
Collaborate with development, operations, and security teams to define cloud strategies and solutions that meet business requirements.
Evaluate and select appropriate cloud services and tools to optimize performance, reliability, and cost-efficiency.
Develop and maintain infrastructure as code (IaC) templates using tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or ARM Templates.
Ensure cloud solutions adhere to industry best practices and organizational security policies.
Monitor cloud environments to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and security.
Provide guidance and support for cloud migration initiatives, ensuring minimal disruption to existing services.
Stay updated with the latest cloud technologies, trends, and best practices to continuously improve cloud architectures.
Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for all cloud architectures and solutions.
Conduct training sessions and workshops to educate teams on cloud best practices and tools.

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field plus five (5) years of experience in cloud architecture or a related field.
In lieu of a Bachelor’s degree and five (5) years of experience, the employer will accept a Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field plus three (3) years of experience in cloud architecture or a related field.
Other experience and skills must include:
Proficiency with major cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or ARM Templates.
Strong understanding of cloud security best practices and tools.
Experience with containerization and orchestration tools such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Knowledge of networking principles and services, including VPC, DNS, load balancing, and firewalls.
Strong scripting skills in languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell.
Experience with monitoring and logging tools such as CloudWatch, Stackdriver, or Azure Monitor.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Relevant cloud certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Solutions Architect Expert, or Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect are a plus.
